subject: Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Kentucky Derby
Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Only two weeks after his shocking run along the rail to win the Derby, Mine That Bird is rated only third in Saturday’s Preakness.
snippet: Only two weeks after his shocking run along the rail to win the Derby, Mine That Bird is rated only third in Saturday’s Preakness.
